resources.string: Spicy teriyaki sauce and moist perfectly cooked veggies and shrimp. Sweet/spicy mild Teriyaki.

Stir-fried rice noodles with eggs, vegetables and tofu in a sauce of tamarind, fish, dried shrimp, garlic, red chilli pepper and sugar. Side condiments include red chilli pepper, lime wedges and peanuts.
Stir fried noodles with Chinese broccoli, egg, and beef, cooked with soy sauce. Salty, balanced with a touch of sour and a wonderful chargrilled flavour.
Signature pieces of our battered chicken tossed in a sweet and spicy sriracha-based sauce with peppers, onions, and carrots. Served on steamed rice.
Curry paste and coconut milk curry served with seafood, vegetables and herbs on rice. Topped with basil leaves and chopped red chili pepper for extra flavor.
Fish served with fresh veggies and vermicelli noodles topped with our ginger stir fry flavour and Peanut-Thairacha sauce.
